title: Crimson Sunset Desert March
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed 2D Anime style illustration, cinematic wide shot (16:9) of a long merchant caravan crossing massive, undulating red sand dunes at sunset. The sky is an intense crimson and orange gradient, featuring soft, stylized clouds. The procession is led by a rider mounted on a fantastical winged beast resembling a camel with sharp features and glowing eyes. Travelers wear Middle Eastern robes and ride heavily laden camels. A tattered flag with a crescent and star motif waves prominently. In the distance, a mysterious silhouetted fantasy city with ornate domes and minarets rises against the horizon. Dramatic lighting, deep shadows stretching long across the sand, detailed line art, stylized shading.
